name: Pappy Saga
description:
Pappy Saga is a story of friendship between a bubble (Pappy) and a snail.

Avoiding the obstacles and collecting the coins, Pappy will able to help his friend to reach the exit ?

Watch out for not to go beyond the left edge or touching the ground and obstacles.

The game is available for iOS only.

Download it form app store : Pappy Saga

Require iOS 6.1 and it's optimized for iPhone 5 and later
